short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered LinkedIn message manager for efficient response to business quieries handling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Description
LinkedIn Message Manager - Your AI-Powered LinkedIn Response Assistant
Efficiently manage your LinkedIn messages with AI-powered assistance. This extension helps you:

Key Features:

- quick message summaries powered by AI 
- smart response suggestions
- pre-made response templates
- customisable response options
- one-click message sending
- clean, unobtrusive interface

Perfect for:

- recruiters handling multiple inquiries
- professionals managing networking messages
- anyone looking to streamline their LinkedIn communications

How it works:

1. click on any LinkedIn message to see an AI-generated summary
2. choose from multiple response options or create a custom response
3. edit and personalise the suggested response
4.a. send your message with one click or 
4.b. copy the suggested message and paste it in the response field of your LinkedIn inbox

Privacy & Security:

- works directly in your browser
- no message data is stored
- secure API handling
- requires OpenAI API key for AI features

Note: This extension requires your own OpenAI API key to function.
Future version will include the API key. 

Version 1.0.0

Data Policy
https://recberry.com/Data

Support
